Traditional in your browser 繁体字的浏览器显示:總

Traditional in Unicode standard 繁体字的Unicode标准:U+7E3D

Older traditional characters 旧繁体字/异体字: 緫

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:总

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+603B

Main pronunciation 主要发音: zǒng

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning collect together.

English senses 英语理解: collect; overall, altogether

Usage example 用法举例: 總裁 zǒng cái (head examiner)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 259

Shuowen 说文解字: 聚束也從糸怱聲臣鉉等曰今俗作摠非是

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 總 mutant 緫 from single-thread 糹 mì and phonetic bright-heart 悤怱 cōng (variant-of 総縂 zǒng) A348 总[總] new-char 总. (name- collect-together (总)総縂總緫 zǒng)

緫字的基本解释

緫
zǒng
古同“总”。

緫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zǒng］
［《廣韻》作孔切，上董，精。］
亦作“捴1”。亦作“搃1”。亦作“摠1”。亦作“総1”。亦作“緫1”。亦作“縂1”。“总1”的繁体字。
(1)聚合；汇集。
(2)谓聚禾稿成束。
(3)束发。亦指束发之带。
(4)结；系。
(5)持。
(6)总括；概括。
(7)总揽。
(8)统领；统率。
(9)众人。
(10)古代车马之饰。
(11)皆；都。
(12)大概。
(13)老是；一直。
(14)总归；毕竟。
(15)通“縱”。释放。
(16)通“縱”。纵然；即使。
[②]［zōng］
［《集韻》祖叢切，平東，精。］
亦作“緫2”。通“緵1”。亦作“縂2”。
丝数名。古以丝八十根为“總”。
[③]［cōng］
［《集韻》麤叢切，平東，清。］
亦作“緫3”。亦作“縂3”。
(1)通“繱”。绢的一种。
(2)通“怱”。参见“總3至”。
(3)通“葱”。参见“總3極”。

緫字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　緫； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页931第15
【集韻】麤叢切，音怱。繱或作緫。帛靑色。一曰輕絹。【博雅】靑也。【周禮·春官·巾車】重翟錫朱緫。【註】緫，靑黑色，以繒爲之。　又【集韻】祖叢切，音㚇。【正韻】祖冬切，音宗。【類篇】絲數。詩曰：素絲五緫。　又【集韻】作弄切，音糉。䍟或作緫。○按五經文字云：緫从怱作總者訛。今緫與總混，當正之。

考證：〔【博雅】靑蒼色。〕　謹照原文靑蒼色改靑也。

緫字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zǒng］
["Guangyun" made Kongqie, Shangdong, Jing. ]
Also known as "Bao 1". Also known as "pin 1". Also known as "摠1". Also known as "総1". Also known as "Long 1". Also called "total 1". Traditional characters of "总1".
(1) Aggregation; Collection.
(2) It is said that Juhe drafts are bundled.
(3) Bunch hair. Also refers to the band of hair.
(4) Knot; tie.
(5) Hold.
(6) Summarize; generalize.
(7) Overview.
(8) Command; Command.
(9) Everyone.
(10) The decoration of ancient carriages and horses.
(11) All; all.
(12) Probably.
(13) Always; always.
(14) Anyway; after all.
(15) Through "vertical". freed.
(16) Through "vertical". Even though; even though.
[②]［zōng］
["Jiyun" Zu Congqie, Pingdong, Jing. ]
Also known as "Long 2". Link "緵1". Also known as "Total 2".
Number of silk names. In ancient times, 80 roots of silk were used as the "total".
[③] [cōng]
["Ji Yun" rough cut, Pingdong, Qing. ]
Also known as "Long 3". Also known as "Total 3".
(1) Through "繱". A kind of silk.
(2) Through "hurried". See "Total 3 to".
(3) Pass "onion". See "Total 3 poles".

[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　緫; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 931 15
【Ji Yun】Cross-cut, quick sound.繱 or make 繱. Silk color. One said light silk. [Bo Ya] Qian Ye. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Towel Car】Zhai Xi and Zhu Ling. [Note] 緫, 靑 black, with 緫 for it.　[Jiyun] Zu Congqie, sound 㚇. [Zhengyun] Zu Dongqie, Yinzong. 【Classes】Number of threads. The poem said: Five silk strips.　 [Ji Yun] Fooling and cutting, sound 糉. You may be forgotten. ○According to the word cloud of the Five Classics: Ling Cong Xu Zuo Zong is wrong. If I am confused with the general manager, we should be justified.
